Setting Your ElastosID Account in Management Project System

From Elastos Developer Website
Jump to: navigation, search

Login elastos.org by your ElastosID account

If you want ElastosOrg to manage your project, or access the project managed by it, you should first sign your personal information in the project management system.

Input your username and password here:



Or,input your username and password here:



If login succeed,you will see:


Then,click the Project Tab link.


Sign in Elastos Project Management System

Here is the Elastos Project Management System home page.



Click the Sign in on the right top corner. Then,go to the page:



By default,your ElasotsID is valuable in the OpenID URL input box. Simply press Login please.

Activate your account in project management system

If it is the first time you sign in Elastos project management system by your ElastosID account, you will see the page below.You must submit personal information to activate your account in project management system.


Fulfill the table and submit. Then,your account has been activated. And you can now log in.


And you can now click My page to see the Issues that you have reported or that had been assigned to you.
